about_the_game:
Will made a complete list of the military statements of the captain Pooper in different languages. At the moment, the only English. Later will be added Russian, Chinese, German, Italian.The same will be added to the French national white flag.

All quotes will follow the game.

All coincidences are accidental and events are fiction, do not try to do it again.

Size 940x500.
